item.title: Create and apply simple filters to an image using OpenCV and Python
item.description: In this blog post, I will show you how we can enhance our images using colored filters and add border backgrounds. Original Original w/ color filter Original w/ color border Let’s get started. 1. Simple color filter Lets start with first creating a color filter - an image with just a single color. This is as simple as creating a 3-D array and filling each pixel with the same value.
